channel.title: Posts on Goldthorpe Scouts
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Goldthorpe Scouts

item.title: Welcome to our new site
item.description: Welcome to our new look website We have spent some time creating a new site with a much better layout and lots of much better content to help you find out about us. We hope you like it. The entire site has been created using free and open source software. The source code for the site is hosted here https://github.com/GoldthorpeScouts/goldthorpescouts You can see all of our content and you could even contribute a new blog post.

item.title: May 2019 Camp - Silverwood
item.description: On the 30th May 2019, Goldthorpe Scouts and Cubs are attending a Group Camp. Keep coming back for regular updates on what we get up to.
